# Exo Enterprise - AI Search Sitemap (llms.txt)
# This file helps AI models (ChatGPT, Perplexity, Claude, etc.) discover and understand site structure

Site: https://exoent.co
Title: Exo Enterprise | The AI Operating System for Departments
Description: Exo Enterprise is an AI-native firm building autonomous departments via Flow OS. We clone your best processes, run departments, and transfer ownership—delivering lasting operational transformation.

# Core Pages

Page: https://exoent.co/
Title: Exo Enterprise - Home
Description: Exo Enterprise homepage. Learn about Flow OS, the AI operating system for autonomous departments, and how we deliver operational transformation through Build → Operate → Manage/Transfer (BOM-T).
Topics: Flow OS, AI departments, autonomous operations, Exo Enterprise

Page: https://exoent.co/flow-os
Title: Flow OS - The AI Operating System for Departments
Description: Flow OS is Exo Enterprise's flagship product—an operating system that automates entire departments by cloning your best processes. Uses reflex agents and regret graphs for autonomous decision-making. Delivered via BOM-T service model.
Topics: Flow OS, reflex agents, regret graph, autonomous departments, AI operating system

Page: https://exoent.co/firm
Title: Exo AI Engine - Advanced Customer Intelligence
Description: Exo's AI engine delivers customer intelligence and firm operations. Part of the broader Exo ecosystem supporting autonomous department operations.
Topics: AI engine, customer intelligence, firm operations

# Future Pages (Planned)

Page: https://exoent.co/departments
Title: Namespaces & Departments
Description: Modular departments within Flow OS ecosystem: Deal OS, Exo Launch, Exo Academy, AURA (HR), and more. Customize your autonomous department configuration.
Topics: Deal OS, Launch, Academy, AURA, namespaces

Page: https://exoent.co/services
Title: BOM-T Services
Description: Build → Operate → Manage/Transfer (BOM-T) service delivery model. We build your AI department (30 days), operate it (90 days), then transfer it to you—fully trained and autonomous.
Topics: BOM-T, Build, Operate, Transfer, services

Page: https://exoent.co/steel
Title: Steel - Consumer Membership Ecosystem
Description: Steel is Exo Enterprise's B2C membership spin-out, powered by the same Flow OS technology. Coming soon.
Topics: Steel, membership, B2C, consumer

# Key Concepts

Concept: Flow OS
Definition: An AI operating system that automates entire departments by replicating your best processes. Uses reflex agents (autonomous decision-making) and regret graphs (error recovery).

Concept: BOM-T
Definition: Build → Operate → Manage/Transfer. Exo's service delivery model: we build your autonomous department (30 days), operate it (90 days), then transfer full ownership to you.

Concept: Reflex Agents
Definition: Autonomous AI agents that make decisions without explicit intervention, using learned processes and decision rules.

Concept: Regret Graph
Definition: A learning mechanism that allows AI agents to recover from errors and optimize future decisions based on past mistakes.

Concept: Exo Enterprise
Definition: An AI-native firm that builds and runs autonomous departments. Parent brand and holding company for Flow OS, Deal OS, Launch, Academy, and other products.

# Contact & Info

Organization: Exo Enterprise
Website: https://exoent.co
Email: Contact via website
Social: Links available on site pages
